alert.note: Alert for Arenac; Gladwin; Iosco; Missaukee; Ogemaw; Roscommon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Arenac, Gladwin, Ogemaw, Roscommon, eastern Missaukee and southwestern Iosco Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 702 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Helen to near Houghton Lake. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. Heavy rain around 1 inch or more per hour is possible SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alger, Houghton Lake, Gladwin, West Branch, Standish, Roscommon, Au Gres, Sterling, Prudenville, St. Helen, South Branch, Maple Ridge, Beaverton, Rose City, Whittemore, Omer, Twining, Turner, Skidway Lake and Hockaday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Arenac; Gladwin; Iosco; Missaukee; Ogemaw; Roscommon
